title: Crafted ward skin not showing up in my inventory
body:
I crafted a bouquet ward ward skin into a permanent, but it doesn't show up anywhere on my account (and has disappeared from my hextech inventory).

The strange thing was, before i craft that ward skin the name was **loot_name_ward_skin_rental_18.

Please help, i disenchant my Project Leona to craft that ward skin (i disenchant that skin because i need 4800 IP to buy that champion + 1050 orange essence.

replies.body: As Lew mentioned, this is currently a known issue.  Some ward skins are not showing up as selectable, but they're still unlocked on the account.  I hope that helps clarify, but let me know if you have any questions!

It is just a bug and you still have the ward on your account.

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na
